alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 9:51PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Coffee, western Geneva, northwestern Walton and northwestern Holmes Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 950 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Samson to near Florala to near Laurel Hill to 18 miles west of Lockhart. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Geneva, Samson, New Brockton, Liberty, Paxton, Kinston, Coffee Springs, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Gaskin, Lytle, Lucile, Darlington, Marl, Ino, Turner Crossroads, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Glendale and Goodman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
